title: LaurenHuet/oceanomics-oceangenomes-genomenotes pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

hifi_dir.errorMessage: HiFi reads directory path must be provided and cannot contain spaces

hic_dir.errorMessage: HiC reads directory path must be provided and cannot contain spaces

assembly.errorMessage: Assembly directory path must be provided and cannot contain spaces

busco_genes.errorMessage: BUSCO genes directory path must be provided and cannot contain spaces

bioproject_id.errorMessage: bioproject_id must be provided without spaces (e.g. PRJNA123456)

version.errorMessage: version should be a short identifier with no spaces (e.g. hic1 or hic2)

date.errorMessage: date should be in vYYMMDD or YYMMDD format (e.g. v230609 or 230609)

tolid.errorMessage: tolid must be provided and cannot contain spaces

taxid.errorMessage: taxid must be an integer NCBI taxon id
